author: Tay Yong Kwang J:
casename: Sim Yong Kim v Evenstar Investments Pte Ltd
counsel: Valerie Freda Ang Mei-Ling and N Sreenivasan (Straits Law Practice LLC) for the petitioner; Kelvin Tan Teck San (Drew and Napier LLC) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Companies/Winding up/Petitioner seeking winding up of company on just and equitable grounds/Petitioner not active participant in running of company to be wound up/Petitioner's complaints about difficulties at work concerning company held through company to be wound up/Petitioner taking back seat in running company held through company to be wound up/Petitioner alleging loss of substratum of company/Whether just and equitable to wind up company/Section 254(1)(i) Companies Act (Cap 50, 1994 Rev Ed)
